00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 
00041 #include "CmdParameterModified.h"
00042 #include "Trace.h"
00043 
00044 CmdParameterModified::CmdParameterModified( const QStringList& oldValueList, SoBaseKit* coinNode , const QString& coinPart, QUndoCommand* parent )
00045 :QUndoCommand( "ModifyParameter" ,parent ), m_oldValueList( oldValueList ), m_newValueList( 0 ),  m_coinNode( coinNode ), m_nodePart( coinPart )
00046 {
00047         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::CmdParameterModified", false);
00048         
00049         SoNode* node = coinNode->getPart( coinPart.toStdString().c_str(), true );
00050         
00051         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00052         int numFields = node->getFields( fieldList );
00053         
00054         m_newValueList = new QStringList;
00055         for(int index = 0; index < numFields; index++)
00056         {
00057                 SbString indexValue;
00058                 fieldList[index]->get( indexValue );
00059                 m_newValueList->append( QString(indexValue.getString() ) );
00060                 
00061         }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 CmdParameterModified::~CmdParameterModified()
00066 {
00067         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::~CmdParameterModified", false );
00068 }
00069 
00070 void CmdParameterModified::undo()
00071 {
00072         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::undo", false );
00073         SoNode* partNode = m_coinNode->getPart( m_nodePart.toStdString().c_str(), true );
00074         
00075         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00076         int numFields = partNode->getFields(fieldList);
00077         
00078          for( int index = 0; index < numFields; index ++)
00079          {
00080                 if(     m_oldValueList[index] != (*m_newValueList)[index] ){
00081                         
00082                         QString value = m_oldValueList[index];
00083                         
00084                         fieldList[index]->set( value.toStdString().c_str());
00085                         
00086                 }
00087          } 
00088 
00089 }
00090 
00091 void CmdParameterModified::redo()
00092 {
00093         Trace trace( "CmdParameterModified::redo", false );
00094         
00095         SoNode* partNode = m_coinNode->getPart( m_nodePart.toStdString().c_str(), true );
00096         
00097         SoFieldList fieldList; 
00098         int numFields = partNode->getFields(fieldList);
00099         
00100          for( int index = 0; index < numFields; index++ )
00101          {
00102 
00103                 if(     m_oldValueList[index] != (*m_newValueList)[index] ){
00104                         
00105                         QString value = (*m_newValueList)[index];
00106                         
00107                         fieldList[index]->set( value.toStdString().c_str());
00108                 }
00109          }
00110 
00111 }
